channel.title: CVE Feed for Merit Lilin Ent. Co., Ltd. -- AH55B04 DVR firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Merit Lilin Ent. Co., Ltd. -- AH55B04 DVR firmware

item.title: CVE-2022-47618|2024-08-03T15:02:36.410Z -- merit%20lilin%20ent.%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- ah55b04%20dvr%20firmware
item.description: Merit LILIN AH55B04 & AH55B08 DVR firm has hard-coded administrator credentials. An unauthenticated remote attacker can use these credentials to log in administrator page, to manipulate system or disrupt service.
